name: Scrapper_Melee.Ice_Melee
display_help: Ice Melee allows the player to use Cold-based attacks, and even conjure up frozen melee weapons. Ice Melee powers are known for their ability to slow an opponent.

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Ice_Melee.Frozen_Fists
powers.display_help: Frozen Fists encrusts your hands in ice, giving them the ability to quickly inflict minor damage on villains. The foe's attack and movement speed is Slowed, due to the chills caused by the cold blows. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 2 ticks of 6.26 smashing damage over 0.3s on target
2 ticks of 25.02 cold damage over 0.3s on target
5.00% chance for 62.56 cold damage on target [CRITICAL]
Only against minions and underlings

Only against targets tougher than minion class

-8.00% run speed, fly speed, jump speed for 5s on target
-8.00% strength to jump height, recharge for 5s on target
Ignores buffs and enhancements
14.08 fire damage on target
Only using Fiery Embrace

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Ice_Melee.Ice_Sword
powers.display_help: You create a blade of solid ice that deals good damage. Being hit by this Ice Sword will Slow a target's movement and attack speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Ice_Melee.Frost
powers.display_help: You create a short cone of Frost in front of you that can deal some damage and Slow a foe's speed, due to their uncontrollable shivering. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 10 ft. radius 90° arc (10 targets max)

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Ice_Melee.Build_Up
powers.display_help: Greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your Accuracy. Recharge: Long

display_info: 20.00% to hit for 10s on self
Unresistable

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Ice_Melee.Ice_Patch
powers.display_help: You emanate a Patch of Ice around you. Foes that step onto the Ice Patch will slip and fall down. This effect lasts until the ice melts. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Ice_Melee.Confront
powers.display_help: Challenges a foe to attack you. Useful to pull a villain off an ally who finds themselves in over their head. A To Hit check required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 4.0 taunt for 23.1s on target
4.0 taunt for 6.16s on target
-75.00% strength to range for 12s on target
Ignores buffs and enhancements

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Ice_Melee.Greater_Ice_Sword
powers.display_help: Your mastery of Ice allows you to create an enhanced blade of solid ice that deals above average damage. Being hit by the Greater Ice Sword will Slow a villain's attack and movement speed, due to the intense chill. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Ice_Melee.Freezing_Touch
powers.display_help: This Freezing Touch will encase a single foe in a block of ice. This will deal high damage over time, as well as freezing him in his tracks, leaving him cold and helpless. Damage: High(DoT), Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Ice_Melee.Frozen_Aura
powers.display_help: Your mastery of cold enables you to dramatically lower the temperature immediately around you. When you perform a Frozen Aura, nearby foes will be frozen within a fragile casing of ice and suffer a moderate amount of cold damage. These frozen foes will break free if attacked. Frozen Aura deals moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
